PySide6 Development Skill - License Notice

This skill provides structured references to:
"Create GUI Applications with Python & Qt6" by Martin Fitzpatrick
Version 6.1, 2025-09-10

The PDF documentation referenced by this skill is copyrighted material.
Code examples from the book are free to use in your own projects.

For official documentation and updates, visit:
- https://www.pythonguis.com/
- https://doc.qt.io/qtforpython-6/

This skill file (.github/skills/pyside6/SKILL.md) provides:
- Table of contents for the 730-page PDF
- Page number references for quick lookup
- Usage guidelines for PySide6 development

The skill itself is provided for internal development reference only.
